Question.Subject: about worldwideptr.com is this site giving amounts properly?
Question.Content: in this website they said after any one earn $20,000 then only they can request for payment is this true, r they given that amount properly, how much time it takes they to transfer that amount? because in their home page they side for free users can earn $100 for view one ad if any body can give proper answer for my questions
Question.ChosenAnswer:
This site is scam. Don't join this site. They will not pay even a dollar, I have experience of many site. If you want to earn some extra then click on this link
http://www.neobux.com/?rh=617669616D626974696F757331
This site is absolutely legit. It has paid me several times, feel free to join this site.
